Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Splash of Art]{Splash of Art}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Artistic Flourish]{Artistic Flourish}

You have divine abilities related to crafting and art.
name: Creation Domain
